paper_abstract: We present a moderately exponential time algorithm for the satisfiability of Boolean formulas over the full binary basis. For formulas of size at most cn, our algorithm runs in time for some constant mu (c) > 0. As a byproduct of the running time analysis of our algorithm, we obtain strong average-case hardness of affine extractors for linear-sized formulas over the full binary basis.
paper_title: A satisfiability algorithm and average-case hardness for formulas over the full binary basis
